properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: JWT authentication secret key. Used to sign the JWT token. This should be a long, random string.

properties.name: jwt.expiration.short
properties.description: Time in milliseconds for the short-lived token to expire. Used when rememberMe = false.

properties.name: jwt.expiration.long
properties.description: Time in milliseconds for the long-lived token to expire. Used when rememberMe = true.

properties.name: storage.location
properties.description: Base directory for storing images (relative to project root)

properties.name: storage.base-url
properties.description: Base URL for accessing images (from web)
